claims.text: What is Super Express passport delivery service?

structured_data.question: What is Super Express passport delivery service?
structured_data.answer: There are occasions when a citizen needs passport urgently. In such situation, citizens can apply for **Super Express** delivery (specific conditions and fees apply). Passport will be issued within 2 (two) working days for Super Express delivery.

citations.quoted_text: What is Super Express passport delivery service?

claims.text: Who can apply for Super Express delivery?

structured_data.question: Who can apply for Super Express delivery?
structured_data.answer: Any citizen of Bangladesh can apply for Super Express delivery.

citations.quoted_text: Who can apply for Super Express delivery?

claims.text: Where can I apply for Super Express passport?

structured_data.question: Where can I apply for Super Express passport?
structured_data.answer: Super Express service is applicable for citizens applying from Bangladesh. This service is not available outside Bangladesh i.e. Bangladesh Missions abroad. Applications for Super Express delivery can be made through the Online Application Portal and it can be processed through any passport office of Bangladesh.

citations.quoted_text: Where can I apply for Super Express passport?

claims.text: What is the Super Express passport delivery process?

structured_data.question: What is the Super Express passport delivery process?
structured_data.answer: Super Express passports are delivered only from the Divisional Passport and Visa Office, Agargaon, Dhaka-1207. Citizens will have to collect Super Express passport from there. Shipment to other passport offices is not possible.

citations.quoted_text: What is the Super Express passport delivery process?

claims.text: After how many years e-passport must be re-issued?

structured_data.question: After how many years e-passport must be re-issued?
structured_data.answer: Last updated: 18 October 2023 Generally, e-passport is issued with the validity of 5/10 years. You can re-issue a new passport by mentioning the previous passport number before or after the expiry date as per your requirement.

application_steps.title: Online Application
application_steps.description: Visit www.epassport.gov.bd and complete the application form online

application_steps.title: Payment
application_steps.description: Pay the e-Passport fees online or through Sonali Bank

application_steps.title: Appointment
application_steps.description: Book an appointment at your preferred enrollment center

application_steps.title: Enrollment
application_steps.description: Visit the enrollment center with required documents for biometric data capture

application_steps.title: Delivery
application_steps.description: Collect your e-Passport from the regional passport office or receive via post

fees.label: Regular Delivery (15 working days) - 48 Pages: 3,450 BDT
Express Delivery (7 working days) - 48 Pages: 6,900 BDT
Super Express Delivery (2 working days) - 48 Pages: 13,800 BDT

service_info.label: New Voter Registration available through NID Wing - Bangladesh Election Commission
Duplicate NID issuance available for lost or damaged NID cards
NID correction service available for name, date of birth, and other information corrections
Voter area migration service available for address changes

portal_links.label: BRTA Service Portal login available at https://bsp.brta.gov.bd/login
BRTA Fee Calculator available at https://bsp.brta.gov.bd/feeCalculator

service_info.label: BRTA Service Portal (BSP) is available from 8:00am to 10:00pm Bangladesh Standard Time
Driving License services available through BRTA including new license, renewal, and duplicate license
Motor Vehicle Registration services available for new vehicles, reconditioned vehicles, and auction purchases
Vehicle Fitness Certificate renewal available through online appointment system
Tax Token renewal service available for vehicle road tax
